title: Add user model and migration
motivation: Need a users table to store registration data.
goal: Create user data model with secure password storage.
requirements: Create User model with email, hashed_password, created_at

title: Implement registration endpoint
motivation: Users need an API to create accounts.
goal: Build registration API with input validation.
requirements: Returns 201 on success, 422 on validation error, 409 on duplicate
acceptance_criteria: Valid registration returns 201 with user ID

manual_steps: Call POST /api/register via curl and verify response

title: Implement login endpoint with token generation
motivation: Users need to authenticate and receive session tokens.
goal: Build login API that issues JWT tokens.
requirements: Returns JWT token on valid credentials
acceptance_criteria: Valid login returns 200 with JWT token
Token contains user ID and expiration

evidence: JWT token decodes correctly with expected claims
